ClassDesc: This class is a calendar widget for displaying and selecting dates. The range of dates supported by this calendar is configurable. The exact appearance and interaction model of this widget may vary between OS versions and themes (e.g. Holo versus Material), but in general a user can select a date by tapping on it and can scroll or fling the calendar to a desired date.
